resources:
Chargement… No videos found, please check your settings.
OK Cancel Import Export
Actions Advanced Source Vidéo Options
Video quality Sélectionnez la qualité de la vidéo
Source Vidéo Play videos from internet, USB storage, and network sources
Réglages Change performance, playlist, and appearance options
Tester l\'économiseur d\'écran "Ouvrir les paramètres système "
Unable to open your device\'s screensaver options This feature was removed by the manufacturer\nPlease visit the Aerial Views website for more details
Remote Local Network
Videos by Apple Stream Apple videos using your internet connection
Videos by Jetson Creative Stream these community videos using your internet connection
Videos by Robin Fourcade Stream these community videos using your internet connection
Local or USB storage Play videos directly from your device or attached USB storage
SMB/Samba share Play videos from a local network share on a PC or NAS device
WebDAV server Play videos stored on a WebDAV server locally or remotely
Utiliser les vidéos Apple
Consommation de données Approx. %1$s per hour
Use community videos
Use community videos
Media scanner options Folder access options
Use Local or USB storage videos
Choose how videos are found Test local search settings
Android scans all local storage, USB devices, etc for videos
Nvidia Shield users, make sure the following option is enabled… Settings > Device Preferences > Storage > Scan for media automatically
Filtrer les dossiers Jouer seulement les vidéos de certains dossiers (appareil / USB / réseau)
Définir les noms des répertoires Exemple: «Aerial» ne joue que des vidéos du répertoire / téléchargements / Aerial / ab & ignore d\'autres dossiers
Specify a single folder where videos are stored
Choose a volume No volume chosen
All volumes
Specify a folder (eg. /videos) No folder specified
Volume not specified Folder not specified Folder does not exist No files found
Videos found in folder: %1$s Videos with unsupported file extensions: %1$s Videos selected for playback: %1$s
No folder specified for filter Videos found by media scanner: %1$s Videos with unsupported file extensions: %1$s Videos removed by filter: %1$s Videos selected for playback: %1$s
Permission Denied Test results
Server details and credentials
Use SMB/Samba share videos
Nom d\'hôte Adresse IP du serveur
Domain name (Optional) The domain name or workgroup of the server
Nom du partage réseau Exemple: /video/aérien/
Nom d\'utilisateur Facultatif
Mot de passe Facultatif
Search subfolders Search all subfolders for videos
Importer/exporter les réglages Importer ou exporter les identifiants SMB vers le dossier de téléchargement
Tester les paramètres de connexion
Import failed Import successful Unable to save imported settings Can\'t find SMB settings file in Downloads folder: %1$s Error while reading and parsing file. Please check the file again for mistakes or invalid characters. SMB settings successfully imported from: %1$s
Export failed Export successful The SMB settings file %1$s already exists in the Downloads folder Error while trying to write SMB settings to %1$s in the Downloads folder Successfully exported SMB settings to %1$s in the Downloads folder
Permission Denied Test results
Reglages
Appearance Customise how things look while videos are playing
Playlist Mute videos, randomise the order, etc
D-Pad/Remote Customise d-pad actions on your remote
Device capabilities View video codecs, resolution support, and other capabilities
Advanced Performance & debug options for troubleshooting
About Version, build info, etc
Import/Export settings Imports or Exports settings to the Downloads folder
Appearance Overlays Slots
Top Row Choose overlays for the top left & right of the screen
Bottom Row Choose overlays for the bottom left & right of the screen
Clock Display the current time
Location Display location or points of interest
Date Display the current date
Weather Display the current weather conditions
Music Display the currently playing song
Message Display up to 2 lines of custom text
Typeface Change the font used to display all screensaver text
Alterner la position du texte Modifiez la position de l\'horloge et de l\'emplacement après chaque vidéo pour éviter les brûlures d\'écran (OLED)
Top Left Top Right
Bottom Left Bottom Right
Lower Slot Upper Slot Empty
Bottom Left, Lower Slot Bottom Left, Upper Slot Bottom Right, Lower Slot Bottom Right, Upper Slot Top Left, Lower Slot Top Left, Upper Slot Top Right, Lower Slot Top Right, Upper Slot
Clock Clock format
Force Latin digits Always show Western digits regardless of system locale settings
Adjust the size of the clock text
Date Custom format
Date format Specify a custom date format For more information on date formats, search for \'Android SimpleDateFormat\' Adjust the size of the date text
Invalid custom date format! e.g. // For example
Apple and Community videos All other videos
Show video location, title or points of interest
Utiliser les noms de fichiers comme emplacement
Adjust the size of the location text
Message
Show custom message
Line 1 Enter text to display, including emoji Line 2
Adjust the size of the text
Typography
Typeface
Weight
Playlist
Silence Lecture des vidéos sans le son
Lecture aléatoire Lecture des vidéos dans un ordre aléatoire
Vitesse de lecture Choisissez une vitesse de lecture
Supprimer les vidéos dupliquées Supprimer les vidéos avec le même nom de fichier de la playlist
Ignorer les vidéos non Apple sur le stockage local et le réseau Ignorer les vidéos qui ne sont pas listées dans les manifestes vidéo Apple
D-Pad/Remote
Vidéo suivante / précédente Sauter une vidéo avec la télécommande (droite / gauche à D-Pad)
Allow speed change during playback Change the speed of the video by pressing up or down on the d-pad of your remote
Playback speed changed to: %1$s
Fonctions TV
Device TV / Affichage Prise en charge des codecs Décodeurs disponibles "Résolution d'écran"
Video & render options Samba/SMB options
Limit video length
Auto refresh rate switching Change the refresh rate of the display to match the video frame rate
Activer le tunneling Utilisez une accélération matérielle (important pour le streaming 4K / HD)
Use alternate MediaCodec parsing Fixes Dolby Vision playback on some older Philips TVs
Activer le cryptage Activer le chiffrement des connexions SMB (peut potentiellement réduire la vitesse de transfert)
Sélectionnez le dialecte du protocole SMB Sélectionnez la version du protocole SMB
Menu text locale Screensaver text (clock, location) locale
Restart App The app must be restarted to change the menu locale
About
Version Build Date
